Hunting for satellites from your backyard can be positively addicting. Sure,
the Orion Nebula or the Andromeda Galaxy appear grand… and they’ll also look
exactly the same throughout the short span of our fleeting human lifetimes.
Since the launch of Sputnik in 1957, humans also have added their own
ephemeral ‘stars’ to the sky. It’s […]

articles.summary:
Fuel Cells | Hydrogen Fuel | Public Transit | Transportation

In an effort to reduce China's harmful and plentiful greenhouse gas emissions,
Chinese company Sifang (a subsidiary of China South Rail Corporation) has
developed the world's first hydrogen powered tram. The tram took two years of
research and development to complete, and will be powered entirely by hydrogen
fuel cells. Since this is a tram […]
articles.title: Hydrogen-Powered Tram Developed in China (alternative-energy-news.info)

articles.summary:
CHICAGO (Reuters) - Home improvement chain Lowe's Cos Inc will stop selling a
type of pesticide suspected of causing a decline in honeybee populations
needed to pollinate key American crops, following a few U.S. retailers who
have taken similar steps last year.
articles.title: Lowe's to eliminate pesticides that hurt crop pollinating honeybees (reuters)

extinction despite steep logging cutbacks in the Northwest.
